summary: A bit of a different type of quest
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://fusromod.com/images/presents.png[/img]

[color=\"#000000\"]My Mods:[/color]
[url=http://fusromod.com/blog/index.php?entry=35]Hillside Home[/url]  - Adds a completely new home to the game in the Wilderness.[color=\"#ffe450\"]*Beta*[/color]
[url=http://fusromod.com/blog/index.php?entry=27]The Maze: Chapter 2[/url]  - Chapter 2 of the Giant Maze.[color=\"#a91313\"]*Alpha*[/color]
[url=http://fusromod.com/index.php?page=mods]Riftrun[/url] - Total Breezehome conversion. Changes walls/everything. [color=\"#a91313\"]*Alpha*[/color]
[url=http://fusromod.com/blog/index.php?entry=32]Honeyside Smithy[/url]  - Adds Smithing Room to Honeyside. [color=\"#ffe450\"]*Beta*[/color]
[url=http://fusromod.com/blog/index.php?entry=28]Breezehome CE[/url]  - Adds Collector\'s Edition to Breezehome. [color=\"#5eca2f\"]*Complete*[/color] 
[url=http://fusromod.com/blog/index.php?entry=29]Honeyside CE[/url]  - Adds Collector\'s Edition to Honeyside. [color=\"#5eca2f\"]*Complete*[/color]
[url=http://fusromod.com/blog/index.php?entry=30]Book of Treasures[/url] - Two new Treasure maps [color=\"#a91313\"]*Alpha*[/color]

[color=\"#000000\"]Installation + Description:[/color]
*Very buggy right now, only for testing purposes.* 

This is my personal attempt at a decent quest pre-CK.. it is a teasure/scavenger hunt with riddles quest, entirely done through notes in the game. I found the funnest quests in this game to be the Journal quests that you would randomly find, you know the ones.. You will find your first note in front of Breezehome and go from there.

This is a Beta stage, I ain\'t proud of it so far, editing like this is just getting frustrating.. It is not entirely completed, I need your feedback because with the nature of this type of quest, I have no idea how hard it is.. Like I said this isn\'t complete, but the end of this stage is Note #6, but I would be very surprised if anyone can reach that point with the difficulty of the last note.

At the very least, take this as a challenge.. Have fun. Don\'t cheat on the riddles!

Check out my other mods,
author: Shawk
